Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to death benefits for certain members under the jurisdiction of the department of corrections and community supervision
Summary: Relates to death benefits for certain members under the jurisdiction of the department of corrections and community supervision.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to death benefits for certain members; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
